website_summaries.verdict: A bag that makes it easy to organize knives and other kitchen utensils when you travel.
pros: Includes zippered pouch for more storage
Slot for name tag or ID
Canvas cover flap offers extra protection
cons: Clips may break even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: A Cook's Perspective
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM! I work at a restaurant 40+ hours a week, and my love for knives is more than a hobby or collection. It's about respect of the knife, which this knife bag has no regard for. The knife slots are extremely loose around the handle so when you tote the case around and open it up, the knives are not secure. I own expensive cutware and obviously going for a bargain bag was a terrible idea. If you truly love your knives, this is NOTthe right case.
customer_reviews.author: Aibal

customer_reviews.title: Best Knife  case I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have all the spaces I need for my knifes plus the pockets make being a Chef easy I will buy this product again when I need a new one. Thank You so much Chef Kyle
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Diebold

customer_reviews.title: Well made roll definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall i was very impressed. I definitely feel as though i got what i paid for, it was money well spent. The only bad thing i can really think of is that you should make your slots for pens just a little bit longer everytime i open it my marker and pen are loose in the roll, really nbd. I really liked the slot for my steel though. The zippers and stitching all seem very well done! (Although the zipper was seperated in two places when it arrived, i just unzipped it and zipped it back and havent had any other issues from it.) Overall im very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Levy Turner

customer_reviews.title: I am a knife snob
customer_reviews.text: When we stay anywhere that I have to be in a kitchen... I have to bring my own knives. I get it, why place super expensive knives where they can be stolen. So I need to carry my own knives. This case has compartments for everything. For your sharpening steel, for all your blades, even extra long sushi knives. It has zipper pocket where I carried my own vegetable peeler and a regular pocket where I put my own small dish towel. I will be leaving again in June to visit and my knives are going with me.
customer_reviews.author: cheffgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Culinary School
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for culinary school. I got a bag from the school, but this one hold as much, is smaller and much easier to carry to and from school Highly recommend for anyone that is going to culinary school or looking for a great knife kit for their knives.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ruszkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know anything yet about durability. But it seems that will be great as well. It seems very sturdily make. Well designed. I’m able to put all the knives I use most in it and have room for a small whip, a few zesters, and garnishing tools. I was particularly impressed that they contacted me and offered help BEFORE it even got here. (Fast as that was) they provided instructions and tips for it’s use. As well as recommendations, and a discount for suggested items. Very helpful. Couldn’t be more pleased with my purchase and their follow-up. Thank you Noble!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife bag! Very well made and durable, should have no problem lasting many years. I really like the zipper that goes all the way around the bag sealing all the knives inside so none will ever fall out. The zippered pocket holds all my cards, peelers, and thermometers. It is easy and convenient to carry with the shoulder strap and the handle. For the price, this bag is fantastic. Highly recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: mark mckeithan

customer_reviews.title: I do like it
customer_reviews.text: Well made I don't know why I needed this but I got it and I am so happy haha Well I did get it to with me hunting for cooking and cutting up game to cook before knives were all over the place then you end up using your hunting knife to cut every thing well that does work but this so so sweet the boys drop a jaw when I pulled this out haha then they gave me a rash of PoPo but they did enjoyed the food
customer_reviews.author: Cecil E Addy

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great knife bag. I used to store a 5 piece Old Hickory Knife set (Boning knife; Carving / Slicing knife; Paring knife; Butcher Knife) and additional favorite kitchen knives that I use for stive cooking, grilling, and smoking. It is just as described. Material is thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag holds enough space for my knives and utensils when I go to work not too big to carry comes with a nice shoulder strap. Definitely recommend for people who work in the industry good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Soraaka

customer_reviews.title: Essential & Simple
customer_reviews.text: I like the roll I believe it is a great fit for storing some of my equipment for traveling, although when it comes to storing some of my items in one of the pockets as soon as you open the roll (usually made for small objects like pens/sharpies/etc) they have a tendency to slip out of the roll. But outside of that the honing steel slot is a favorable feature, the amount of slots fits my needs for what I need to carry around. The utensil pockets (one a zip up mesh pattern and a solid velcro pocket) are both useful for things like my piping tips, spoons, etc. overall a solid roll.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Chef knife bag, Not as long as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bag for chef , but I have two knives longer then a chefs knife it doesn’t fit in the bag. Also, the slots are to small for my knifes too. overall I am happy to buy it because the quality it is good!
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Very durable canvas case.
customer_reviews.text: This has adequate room for a basic knife set. I carry 2 boning an 8", 10", 12", 12" roast knife and bread knife plus steel. Everything fits plus 1 slot left over. This is not a hard case; no fiberboard inserts. The canvas is thick enough that I do not miss them and it means that thorough washing is possible if needed. I've only had it accouple of weeks, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Grey

customer_reviews.title: Holds A Lot
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea just how large this bag was! It's huge. Fits all 6 of my chef's knives plus 4 steak knives and there's still room for others in the zippered pouch. It rolls up nicely and has a long strap so I can haul it. Looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Flava

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and useful
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my son who is working in a restaurant as a chef and he absolutely loves it! Especially likes the pocket to put the knife sharper so it does not bump into the knives! I would totally recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag, works as advertised, ups your game if you cook away from home
customer_reviews.text: I like to cook for larger groups of people, and I need some mobile solutions for when I cook for my squadron. This roll is great for a spare set of travel knifes. This keeps the knives safely separate from each other and secure in place.
customer_reviews.author: mikeg77

customer_reviews.title: durability,easy to use,carry
customer_reviews.text: gave as Xmas gift to grandson. He loved it. He is a college student ,works part-time as cook. He likes his knives sharp clean and protected, This fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G. Oiivera

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner and it is a great knife bag. She is very happy with this product. The customer service on the other hand is awful. The main reason I bought this was for the warranty. When she tried to register it online there was no response for weeks and when there was one it was very demeaning and unprofessional. Because of this I will probably never buy another product from them again
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in pictures
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment!! There is no knife slots except for 4 tiny paring knife/utensil slots and two zippered parts!! I’m a Chef and needed this! A Chef doesn’t put their good knives in a pouch! I want a refund !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Instructions would be nice
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of pockets and spaces. It would have been nice to get some instructions so i knew what each pocket was for. Overall though the product seems to be a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Sproul

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but one small thing
customer_reviews.text: I love my pack. It's small and durable enough. So far I've spilt cream and Gatorade on it. The one thing I would change is the position of the pockets that the knifes are held in. I wish they were on the opposite side so I can open my pack and just pull my knife out. Instead of completely opening and unfolding its to pull just one knife out. Other Than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Just got the roll and filled with my knives. Seems like a sturdy bag and well constructed. I do recommend edge guards as the blades do touch and rub when the roll is opened. Other than that, a perfect roll for the 8 knives and the handful of other things I carry with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well for what it is designed for. I love how easy and safe it is to get to my knives every day at work with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Seagull

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bag is really good. It comes with a carrying strap which makes it convenient on the go, just hang it from your shoulder. The only drawback is that the pockets are smallish so that the only thing that could fit in them is the knife handle. Since your blades will be sticking up, I recommend getting protective sheaths so your sharp blades are not exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great knife bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife bag. I got it for my boyfriend's birthday and he absolutely loves it! The slots have elastic so they can hold the largest knife and smallest knife with out them moving around in the bag. The buckles are a great feature for keeping the bag rolled up tightly. I know some other reviews state that the knives ruin the material. I would highly suggest getting knife guards to keep the bag, as well as your knives in better shape longer. Over all this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Keep my knives sharp...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very durable. I used this bag to transport my knives to be sharpened. I will use it also to transfer them to the summer kitchen I have on my porch. Beats wrapping my precious knives in newspaper to transport them.
customer_reviews.author: Arlvi

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for starter
customer_reviews.text: Totally didnt realize it was supposed to come with a shoulder strap until someone pointed it out in class 😹😹😹 but all in all it does its job. So I give 12/10
customer_reviews.author: VeryRevMathiasLust

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice carrying case. I am not a professional, but I like to travel with my knives when I go on a trip and will be cooking. This does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the new case. My old one was falling apart. The material on this one is great and it’a got some extra little compartments and stuff to hold sharpies and other various things. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. Easy to use and very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Easy to use and very durable. I do not like the blades being open so I had to order blade guards to use with it but that is just me. Due to the knives being so close together one could cut oneself if one did not have blade guards.
customer_reviews.author: McEgg

customer_reviews.title: Good Has x Case
customer_reviews.text: Don't transport my knives much but when sharpening time comes it keeps them from banging around in the back seat
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this bag i recently received some cooking knives as a gift and this bag is perfect to store them where i can keep them from getting dull or dinged up very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Finally I look like a chef
customer_reviews.text: Are you a chef? Do you want to be a chef? Or just pretend you're a chef? Well, for less that the price of your mis en place, you could be playing the part. Just put your knives in(or what ever you have laying around your kitchen to fill it up) and sling this bad boy over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: joseph hiester

customer_reviews.title: Decent Knife Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because it indicated that it can hold a 14 inch knife. Well, it cannot hold my 14 inch knife. But all the other knives it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: G. Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This case is really thick and durable! It's really large. I can take my entire knife set plus some to the knife sharpener easily now without worry. Very sturdy zippers and clips to keep everything from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: My husbands a chef he uses this for his knives carrying to and from work
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this strictly for my fish/filet knives. It even holds my electric knife.
customer_reviews.author: ktrahant

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Roll which covers mostly everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Great Knife Roll which covers mostly everything you need. Only gripe I'd have with the product is that the loops for pens and small gear has a little loose bungee which unfortunately has let some of my tweezers to fall out. Not a big deal since there is a zip pocket next to it. However, if those bungees were a bit tighter, this roll would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Plan on ordering a second one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a father's day present for the hubby. To hold his new knife set. I liked it so much, I'm keeping it. LoL. Works great for my hand held gardening tools & do-dads. I'll have to order dad another one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Boehlke

customer_reviews.title: High quality knife bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect knife bag for my knives, clears up valuable counter space from my old knife block, and can fit nicely in my utensil drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Jared S

customer_reviews.title: Already on my second case in 4 months first one the clip broke and they replaced no problem.
customer_reviews.text: Already on my second case in 4 months the first one the clip broke and they replaced no problem now stitching is giving way on the second case. If you are Professional looking to give this case any kind of workout it won't hold up😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knife cut through
customer_reviews.text: Started out nicely with local travel. Air traveled with this in checked luggage only 2 times round trip (4 legs total). Upon my last return August of 2020 noticed knife sliced right through bag over 3” rendering this carrier completely useless and unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Nine months and going.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no broken zippers or anything. Some of my knives have sliced a hole or two inside, but they are sharp. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Despain

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and designed.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my knife bag! Very impressed with the quality and designed. Best feature is the buckle clasp most knife bags use Velcro which after a while doesn't hold up. My husband loved it so much I ordered one for him to replace his Wusthof knife bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Nicole Butner

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great knife bag, plenty of slots for knives or utensils, zipper pouch , Velcro pocket, pencil and marker slots, shoulder sling, and name card window
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Great knife bag!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my significant other who is a professional chef. It fits everything he needs and is high quality. Love that it rolls up and has a zipper. It has different compartments for different things, it was thoughtfully designed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Boutilier

customer_reviews.title: great for knives
customer_reviews.text: I use it for knifes and another things and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great idea ...not the best in function
customer_reviews.text: Knives move around in case excessively, as there are no upper elastic loops or fabric loops. Bearing that in mind not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: good bag for work or home
customer_reviews.text: Quality knife bag for the money. It has plenty of space and extra pockets for your goodies. Super light weight and portable.
customer_reviews.author: owlin

customer_reviews.title: Get blade covers
customer_reviews.text: Nice rollup with strap and zippered inside pocket. Recommend getting blade covers prior to using.
customer_reviews.author: TyeTye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loves bag. Uses cut kitchen towels to wrap in for extra protection to wrap individual knives in
customer_reviews.author: Camille A

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.text: This knife back is perfect! It holds way more than what I was expecting! The pictures certainly don't do any justice at all!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well made for a really good price.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and seemingly well made for a really good price (only time will tell as far as "well made" will actually turn out). I've had more expensive bags/rolls in the past that I didn't like nearly as much once the charm of a "name brand" wore off. I would not hesitate to do business with this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Szalkowski

customer_reviews.title: Mission Accomplished
customer_reviews.text: i've been slowly collecting knives for years and needed to protect them in a cross country move. This did just that. Especially loved the fact that I didn't have to get a separate one for my cleavers. All in one place. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bag.
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of knives, spoons and other kitchen equipment and everything fit so well into the bag. I also did not think it would close will all i put into it and it did so its very room. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: hodges cormier jr

customer_reviews.title: Great knife bag
customer_reviews.text: As a professional cook i have to carry a lot of knives for work. This bag does just that. I am able to carry all my knives and honing steel. I especially like that the small zipper pocket holds my other tools that i need such as scissors thermometer and peeler. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand why the product is not the same. I ordered this product because I saw that there was a place for the Knife Sharpener. First order no. Ok i can still But when I ordered a second Back to the slot for the Knife Sharpener. Why not the same, which 2 it's my friend that I bought to him because I see this product is good. It was a mistake that did not match the image shown.
customer_reviews.author: Athittaya Pinwann

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. Very nice! Exactly what I was looking for. I gave it a four star on durability only because of the inside mesh pouch. I’m not sure how long that will hold up but everything else is rock solid!!!!! Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: The knife roll material appears very durable. Lots of room for knives. Two areas for additional chef tools. Two supporting clasps to keep roll secure. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: John Williams

customer_reviews.title: Keeping their knives together and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sons who are aspiring chefs. They seem to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Camp

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Great knife guard to start up. Perfect 8slots for knives. Pockets and zippers for more security. Really feels like your knives are all PROTECTED!
customer_reviews.author: Ludy Ann Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Knife protection
customer_reviews.text: I'm a home style butcher. I do butchering for home purposes on livestock and wildlife. This products appear to be perfect for me. I feel more like a small time professional.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Works well, and has an extra zipper to make sure they are secure and unable to get out when we travel with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Frey

customer_reviews.title: Well built and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: A great knife roll, built well does everything I need it to do. Extra pockets always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a remarkably stout little knife bag. It’s just long enough to fit a 13” roast slicer and the additional storage pockets are good for other tools - I even managed to fit a whetstone in the bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Adams

customer_reviews.title: good for home use
customer_reviews.text: I did not see that it was named "home and chef". I would have gone for a more heavy duty bag, for durability and stature. This will do for now. My previous knives and bag were lost in a fire at my place of employment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, holds all of my knives and utensils perfectly. Made of a nice durable material, feels like I will use it for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the knife bag very long but so far it's working out great. Well made with practical and useful pockets. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bag is really nice, its a think canvas and the zipper is thick and well made. The divets( i dint know what theyre called) where you strap the bag and the strap are good quality and matte metal.
customer_reviews.author: frania

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected surprise
customer_reviews.text: Just received my chef knife bag. Really like the construction quality as well as the padding. It will protect my knives very well. Also having a extra pocket for misc items is very useful. I will enjoy this bag for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great. Even if you put multiple knives on one side the bag remains balanced. It also has SO MANY pockets. If you are thinking of buying this for yourself or someone you know. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Orr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Im traveling for a catering event and wanted an affordable sturdy and easy to pack knife bag. This is perfect since its lite weight and has a zipper that protects not only the knives but you !!
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Great but little issue with knives falling out
customer_reviews.text: Great except when tipped the wrong way, your knives will fall out of their slots and when out of carrier when you unzip it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: An Approval from an Amateur Chef
customer_reviews.text: I like the compactness of this bag and all the different pockets/slots to store your knives and culinary gadgets and utensils. Super sturdy, durable, compact, and sleek-looking!
customer_reviews.author: Daisuke Yoshida

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to move a set of good chef's knives from one place to another.
customer_reviews.text: Great! If you value your good knives and need to travel/transport, this bag will keep them safe yet packable. Nice design, and has safe pockets for many different sizes. And, has a removable shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: L. smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very sturdy. There is a great deal of space for multiple knives.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Yager

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: little bit too short is for my 11.5 yanagiba with sheath. But it’s my fault. I didn’t check before purchase. Otherwise it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng Hui

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Love how compact it is and has a slot for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Maren Jajczyk

customer_reviews.title: Great knife bag!
customer_reviews.text: Thick material, sturdy zipper, a specific pouch for my cleaver and a spot so my sharpener doesn't clang against my blades. What more could I ask for? Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hull

customer_reviews.title: Misunderstood
customer_reviews.text: I thought the description said up to 18" knife would fit but the tip of my 12" knife might start poke through the top of the bag which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The Chef Knife Bag is of good quality. It fits all of the knives and comfortable to carry. I will recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my knives and they all fit perfectly. Good stuff man.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Ariza

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Chef’s Knife Roll  You will Love the space for your steel ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Chef Knife bag holds 8 knives securely, heavy duty zipper and the bag’s material is good gauge material. After seeing this knife bag I think it is worth twice the price compared to others I have purchased in the past !
customer_reviews.author: Chef 81 CIA

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two originally just for my knives, turned around and bought another for my art brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam L. Escher

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like it it holds my knives will and been working very well for now. The only thing i can say is i wish the strap was padded but besides that it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a budget roll.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do for cheap. I’d go with either this one for a budget roll or a leather roll for a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be really nice and durable, let’s hope it’ll fulfill the expectations
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I even have room for my apron with all the knees and tools I'm required to have.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hand

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I guess i expected something a little smaller ,,,this is being used to put several knives in my camper ,,,,it will suffice
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I needed a bag to hold my chef knives for BBQing. It also holds my 12” slicing knives with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag with a purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He is taking culinary in college. He definitely likes this bag. It’s light and easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife roll!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great quality. If you only need a roll for 8 knives or so, this roll is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my set- good basic design, seems sturdy so far (hence the four stars- only been a couple weeks) and can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: GWM

customer_reviews.title: Measurements
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge! You need several knives and other utensils for this because it is very big! Not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would get again if I didn't already have.
customer_reviews.text: Great design, everything fits right where I want it to, have not had it long enough to give it a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best knife roll!
customer_reviews.text: Best knife roll yet if not ever. Value beyond the dollar and fits everything better than messer and I get excited everytime I open it.
customer_reviews.author: pryvet

customer_reviews.title: An excellent portable kit bag.
customer_reviews.text: I now have enough space to keep my knife kit with a protective zipper to help keep it safe from fall off the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: Grate way to transport you knife's. So far I love using it keeps all my blade for work nice and safe.

customer_reviews.title: Very good material.
customer_reviews.text: Knife bag holds everything I need for work, and I like that it's made of very good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Montano

product_meta.title: Chef Knife Bag (8+ Slots) is Padded and Holds 8 Knives PLUS Your Meat Cleaver, Knife Steel, 4 Utensils, and a Zipped Pouch for Tools! Durable Knife Carrier also Includes a Name Card Holder. (Bag Only)
feature_bullets: HOLDS WIDE ASSORTMENT OF KNIVES AND TOOLS– Knife roll has 8 slots for knives ranging from paring knives up to 18” knives plus a covered slot for your knife sharpening steel, 4 slots for tasting spoons, AND a zippered pouch for extra tools! KNIVES/TOOLS NOT INCLUDED.
EASY TO CARRY – Our chef knife bag includes both a handle AND shoulder strap (removable) for your preferred method of transport.

DURABLE – Padded for extra protection and designed to withstand many years of daily use. Instead of fragile fabric that punctures and cuts easily, we specifically chose a 600 Denier Canvas woven out of tough, sturdy polyester to give you a knife roll you can rely on.
EASILY ID YOUR KNIFE STORAGE BAG: A slot for your nametag or business cards means you can easily identify your knife roll from other chefs’. Also throw in some extra business cards for referrals!

SAFE AND SECURE – Our chef’s bag features a tough canvas cover flap as extra protection for your knives, a zipper to secure the knives safely inside, and adjustable straps to make sure they stay put. Roll it up, zip it up, and you’re safely on your way!
